name: Gybi - BossDemo
description:
=_= Gybi - Boss Demo =_=

This game was made in Unity for a College project. The task was to make a tabletop game focused heavily on level design. I didn't read the slides that came with the assignment and mistook it as a digital game.

There are two players. Player one must attack the boss and predict his moves to take his health away. Player two cannot attack, but must aide Player one by dropping hearts when they are low.

Assets List:

Font = https://www.dafont.com/early-gameboy.font

Art = https://rekkimaru.itch.io/gb-studio-dungeon-tileset-8x8
